title: Hyundai opens booking for new SUV Alcazar at token of Rs 25,000; Here are key features and other details
description: Hyundai Motor India begins bookings for the new Alcazar, requiring a Rs 25,000 deposit. The SUV boasts a bold design, premium interiors, and advanced safety features. It offers various powertrains, including petrol and diesel options. The Alcazar comes in four variants and nine colors, appealing to different customer preferences.
